Moistening

Moistening is the alchemy process in Remixed Dungeon that involves using potions on arrows to create special ammunition with enhanced effects.

Description

Moistening is a specific alchemy technique that transforms regular Common Arrows into special arrows with additional effects by combining them with potions at an alchemy pot.

Types of Moistened Arrows

  • Poison Arrow - Created with Potion of Toxic Gas, poisons enemies
  • Frost Arrow - Created with Potion of Frost, slows enemies
  • Fire Arrow - Created with Potion of Liquid Flame, burns enemies
  • Health Arrow - Created with Potion of Healing, heals allies
  • Paralysis Arrow - Created with Potion of Paralytic Gas, paralyzes enemies
  • Amok Arrow - Created with Potion of Strength, causes enemies to attack each other

Process

1. Find an alchemy pot on the dungeon level
2. Have [[rpd:common_arrow|Common Arrows]] and the desired potion
3. Use the alchemy pot and select both the arrows and potion
4. The process converts regular arrows into special arrows

Strategy

  • Create specialized ammunition for fighting specific enemies
  • Convert excess potions into ranged combat advantages
  • Useful for ranged weapon users to enhance effectiveness
  • Saves inventory space by converting potions into arrows

Advantages

  • Converts single-use potions into single-use arrows with more targeted effects
  • Allows ranged application of potion effects
  • Creates tactical advantages against specific enemies
  • Makes efficient use of excess potions

Disadvantages

  • Cannot be undone once arrows are moistened
  • Requires access to an alchemy pot
  • Limited by supply of arrows and potions

Related

  • Arrows - All types of arrows
  • Alchemy - The broader crafting system
  • Potions - Items used in moistening
  • Ranged Weapons - Weapons that use arrows
  • Common Arrow - Base arrow for moistening

Content Verification

  • Information source: Potion implementations and Arrow.java
  • All moistening mechanics verified against actual game code
